title: KendoUI Sortable Widget with MVVM
content:
I've been using [Kendos MVVM](https://demos.telerik.com/kendo-ui/web/mvvm/index.html) wherever I can, it's such an elegant way to render a javascript object.  So as of Q1 2014 here comes along this amazing new [sortable](https://demos.telerik.com/kendo-ui/web/sortable/index.html) widget!  It's just so badass...  
  
Problem is I didn't see an MVVM demo.  So after talking to support (really, the developer)...he said the widget was created to modify the DOM not be a fully bindable widget to replace the grid\\listview\\etc; this widget is to be like a LAYER on top of those.  
  
So I crafted up this JSBin which seems to work...kinda have to handle the sorting\\ordering manually...perhaps this can be made into a plugin or something....however...she does work :)  
  
[Click for JSBin Link and Code](https://jsbin.com/cajacuvi/8/watch)
seoDescription: Here's the missing KendoUI MVVM Sortable widget demo you've always wanted!
